title: Scotts Bluff National Monument: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes         NPS  Entrance Fees Individual - hikers or bicyclists $3.00 - Valid seven days Motorcycle $3.00 - Valid seven days Private, non-commercial vehicle $5.00 - Valid seven days   Commercial Tour Fees  Commercial sedan, 1-6 passenger capacity $25.00 - Valid one day Commercial Van 7-25 passenger capacity $40.00 - Valid one day Commercial Bus 26+ passenger capacity $100.00 - Valid one day    Annual Park Pass  Scotts Bluff Annual Pass $15.00 - Valid for one year from date of purchase at Scotts Bluff National Monument. This pass is non-transferable.   Interagency Pass Program America the Beautiful - Annual National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass $80.00 - Valid one year from date of purchase, this pass is non-transferable. America the Beautiful - Senior National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass $10.00 - Valid for holder's lifetime, must be a permanent resident of the United States who is at least 62 years. This pass is non-transferable. America the Beautiful - Access National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass Free - Valid for holder's lifetime, non-transferable pass available to United States citizens or permanent residents with permanent disabilities. America the Beautiful - Military National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass  Free - for active duty military and their dependents. Valid one year from date of purchase, this pass is non-transferable. America the Beautiful - Every Kid in a Park Pass for 4th graders Free - for 4th grade students who have completed the activity on the Every Kid in a Park website. Print the voucher after completing the activity and bring it to the monument to exchange for a pass that will be valid through August 31, 2016.
